T02TD1524E:79a-1: shr'i gu hya ratna tsindha ma ni n'a ma /
T02TD1524E:79a-3: dpal gsang ba rin po che yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba /
T02TD1524E:79a-4: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1524E:79a-5: mkha' mnyam sprin phung 'dza' tshon 'brug sgra sgrogs //
T02TD1524E:79a-7: rgyun drab char rgyun glog 'gyu ba //
T02TD1524E:79a-8: rgya mtsho las ni yid bzhin nor bu 'o ma'i mtsho //
T02TD1524E:79a-9: 'khor los bsrub dang bsrubs pa'i sbyor bas gnas 'dir rgyas //
T02TD1524E:79a-10: rdo rje sku la des gnas pa'i //
T02TD1524E:79a-12: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu brgyan //
T02TD1524E:79a-13: rang byung 'di ni he ru ka'o //
T02TD1524E:79a-14: dang por re zhig skye bos bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa las dkyil 'khor du dbang dang dam tshig thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas sems can mngon du byas te /
T02TD1524E:79a-15: byang chub kyi sems chad du med pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1524E:79a-16: h'um yig nag po las 'od zer gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phros pas rdo rje'i tshogs su gyur pa dang /
T02TD1524E:79a-17: de dag las 'od 'phros khro bo'i tshogs dpag tu med par gyur nas /
T02TD1524E:79a-18: lugs dang lugs las bzlog pa'i sngags 'di brjod de /
T02TD1524E:79a-19: aom hr'i: gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02TD1524E:79a-20: sarba du sht'an h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa las /
T02TD1524E:79a-21: rdo rje dang me 'od 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis phyogs thams cad du khyab par gyur par blta'o //
T02TD1524E:79a-22: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis bla ma dang dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i tshogs nam mkhar bltas la /
T02TD1524E:79a-23: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas la bzod par gsol te /
T02TD1524E:79a-24: 'di la mi snang bar gyur nas phyi nang bdag dang bcas pa thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par blta'o //
T02TD1524E:79a-25: de'i ngang las rten dang brten pa mnyam par rang bzhin gyis grub pa /
T02TD1524E:79a-26: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dur khrod dang bcas par byung ba ste /
T02TD1524E:79a-27: mkha' mnyam stong ba las byung zhing //
T02TD1524E:79a-28: nam mkha'i mkha' la longs spyod cing //
T02TD1524E:79a-29: he ru ka dpal dkyil 'khor mchog / bha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1524E:79a-30: sna tshogs padma mi shigs pa //
T02TD1524E:79a-31: ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul las //
T02TD1524E:79a-32: a'a li k'a li sbyor dbus h'um //
T02TD1524E:79b-0: shr'i he ru ka khrag 'thung @79b dpal //
T02TD1524E:79b-1: skad cig gis ni sku rdzogs pa //
T02TD1524E:79b-2: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1524E:79b-3: dus mtshan dang ni 'jigs byed dag / g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnon mdzad pa //
T02TD1524E:79b-4: bee d'ur nam mkha'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1524E:79b-5: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen bo'i mchog / sna tshogs rdo rje phyag rgya drug / zla phyed mgo phreng dag gis brgyan //
T02TD1524E:79b-6: sgeg sogs nyams kyi ro ldan pa //
T02TD1524E:79b-7: stag lpags dar gyi cod ban dang //
T02TD1524E:79b-8: yid bzhin nor bu spyi bor 'dzin //
T02TD1524E:79b-9: rdo rje phag mo sku la 'khril //
T02TD1524E:79b-10: dz'i ba sindhu ra mdog mtshungs //
T02TD1524E:79b-11: thod pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub can //
T02TD1524E:79b-12: gcer bu bcu drug na tshod ldan //
T02TD1524E:79b-13: rus pa'i 'khor lo mgo phreng dang //
T02TD1524E:79b-14: cod pan du ma'i rgyan gyis sbras //
T02TD1524E:79b-15: skra grol ma ni spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1524E:79b-16: bde chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1524E:79b-18: he ru ka ni sku mdog dkar //
T02TD1524E:79b-20: 'khor lo dril bu legs bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1524E:79b-21: he ru ka ni sku mdog ljang //
T02TD1524E:79b-22: l'a ma dang ni gnyis su med //
T02TD1524E:79b-24: rgya gram dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1524E:79b-25: nub phyogs padma'i gdan stengs su //
T02TD1524E:79b-26: he ru ka dpal r'a ga'i mdog / dum skyes ma dang gnyis med pa //
T02TD1524E:79b-28: lho phyogs padma'i phyogs la yang //
T02TD1524E:79b-29: he ru ka dpal gser mdog can //
T02TD1524E:79b-30: gzugs can ma yis sku la 'khyud //
T02TD1524E:79b-31: rin chen pad snod bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1524E:79b-32: de dag kun kyang zhal gcig ma //
T02TD1524E:79b-33: phyag gnyis pa la spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1524E:79b-34: dar gyi cod pan can 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan zhabs kyis mnan ba phyag rgya drug gis spras pa bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid can no //
T02TD1524E:79b-35: mtshams kyi padma'i 'dab ma la byang chub kyi sems kyi snod ka p'a la bdud rtsis bkang ba bzhi'o //
T02TD1524E:79b-36: rang byin brlab pa'i rim pa ste //
T02TD1524E:79b-37: lus kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa //
T02TD1524E:79b-38: gnas kyi rim pa rab sbyor bas //
T02TD1524E:79b-39: lhan skyes ye shes bdag nyid do //
T02TD1524E:79b-40: sbubs ka sum mdo lte snying ga / rlung me chu sa rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1524E:79b-41: sgal tshigs ri rab lhun po ste //
T02TD1524E:79b-42: chu shing me tog lta bu yi //
T02TD1524E:79b-44: ge sar lte bar bcas pa ste //
T02TD1524E:80a-2: lugs dang lugs min sa bon dbus //
T02TD1524E:80a-4: zhal bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis //
T02TD1524E:80a-5: gsum gsum spyan mnga' 'gyur ba'i zhal //
T02TD1524E:80a-7: dus mtshan dmar ba g-yas brkyang dang //
T02TD1524E:80a-8: g-yon zhabs 'jigs byed nag po mnan //
T02TD1524E:80a-9: rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku dang mthun //
T02TD1524E:80a-10: g-yas pa gser gyi 'od dang mtshungs //
T02TD1524E:80a-11: rgyab ni padma r'a ga'i mdog / aindra n'i la zhal g-yon no //
T02TD1524E:80a-12: rdo rje dril bu dang po ste //
T02TD1524E:80a-13: gnyis pa glang po'i pags pa bsnams //
T02TD1524E:80a-14: da ma ru dang dgra sta dang //
T02TD1524E:80a-15: gri gug mdung rtse gsum pa ni //
T02TD1524E:80a-16: g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1524E:80a-17: kha tv'am ga dang thod khrag dang //
T02TD1524E:80a-18: rdo rje'i zhags pa tshangs pa'i skud //
T02TD1524E:80a-19: thor tshugs dar gyi cod pan can //
T02TD1524E:80a-20: zla phyed sna tshogs rdo rje dang //
T02TD1524E:80a-21: yid bzhin nor bu dbu la 'jog / rus pa'i 'khor los spyi bor mtshan //
T02TD1524E:80a-22: yang dag 'khyud pa'i phag mo yang //
T02TD1524E:80a-23: bde ster rang bzhin sku mdog dmar //
T02TD1524E:80a-24: zhal gcig phyag gnyis gcer bu'i tshul //
T02TD1524E:80a-25: byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam bar 'khyud //
T02TD1524E:80a-26: rdo rje thod pa bsnams pa ste //
T02TD1524E:80a-27: sdang phyogs la sdigs skra grol ma //
T02TD1524E:80a-28: phyag rgya lngas spras yab la dgyes //
T02TD1524E:80a-29: bde chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1524E:80a-30: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma la /
T02TD1524E:80a-37: dmar po dang ser mo'i mdog rim pa bzhin du zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi ma spyan gsum ma g-yas gnyis na da ma ru dang gri gug / g-yon gnyis na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa skra grol ba /
T02TD1524E:80a-38: gcer bu dum bu'i ske rags kyis brgyan pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1524E:80a-39: de dag gi mtshams rnams su byang chub sems kyis rab tu gang ba'i snod bzhi bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid can no //
T02TD1524E:80a-40: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
T02TD1524E:80a-41: bu dz'a ao aa go r'a de m'a //
T02TD1524E:80a-42: k'a ao tri ko ka la k'a hi //
T02TD1524E:80a-43: pre gri soo su na si ma ku //
T02TD1524E:80a-44: thugs kyi 'khor lo mdog mthing nag / rdo rje'i phreng bas yongs bskor ba //
T02TD1524E:80b-0: pulli @80b ra ma la ya mgor //
T02TD1524E:80b-1: thod pa'i dum bu rab gtum mo //
T02TD1524E:80b-2: dz'a la ndha ra spyi gtsug tu //
T02TD1524E:80b-3: keng rus chen po gtum mig ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-4: aoddin rna ba g-yas par yang //
T02TD1524E:80b-5: keng rus can dang 'od ldan ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-6: aarbu da ni ltag khung du //
T02TD1524E:80b-7: mche gtsigs sna chen dpa' mo'o //
T02TD1524E:80b-8: go d'a pa r'i rna ba g-yon //
T02TD1524E:80b-9: lha dgra dpa' bo'i blo can ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-10: r'a me shva r'i smin ma'i dbus //
T02TD1524E:80b-11: 'od dpag med dang mi'u thung ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-12: de bi ko ta mig tu ni //
T02TD1524E:80b-13: rdo rje 'od dang lang dbang phyug / m'a la ba ni phrag par yang //
T02TD1524E:80b-14: rdo rje'i sku dang shing grib ste //
T02TD1524E:80b-15: thugs kyi rigs las des 'byung ba'i //
T02TD1524E:80b-18: gsung gi 'khor lo dmar ba'i mdog / padma'i phreng bas yongs bskor ba //
T02TD1524E:80b-19: k'a ma r'u ba mchan khung du //
T02TD1524E:80b-20: myu gu can dang sa srung ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-21: ao tre nu mar rdo rje'o //
T02TD1524E:80b-22: ral pa can dang 'jigs byed ma'o //
T02TD1524E:80b-23: tri sha ku ni lte bar ni //
T02TD1524E:80b-24: dpa' chen rlung gi shugs can ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-25: ko sa la ni sna rtser yang //
T02TD1524E:80b-26: rdo rje h'um mdzad chang 'thung ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-27: ka ling ga khar rab bzang dang //
T02TD1524E:80b-28: lha mo sngo bsangs legs gnas la //
T02TD1524E:80b-29: lam pa ka ni mgrin par yang //
T02TD1524E:80b-30: rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-31: k'a nytsi snying gar dpa' bo ni //
T02TD1524E:80b-32: 'jigs byed che dang rta rna ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-33: hi m'a la ya mdoms su ni //
T02TD1524E:80b-34: mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-35: gsung gi rigs las nges 'byung ba'i //
T02TD1524E:80b-36: 'di dag ni sa la spyod pa'o //
T02TD1524E:80b-37: sku yi 'khor lo mdog dkar zhing //
T02TD1524E:80b-38: 'khor lo'i phreng bas yongs bskor ba //
T02TD1524E:80b-39: pre ta p'u ri mtshan ma la //
T02TD1524E:80b-40: stobs po che dang 'khor shugs can //
T02TD1524E:80b-41: gri ha de ba bshad lam du //
T02TD1524E:80b-42: rin chen rdo rje dum skyes ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-45: su wardvi ba byin par yang //
T02TD1524E:80b-46: nam mkha'i snying dang go cha ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-47: n'a ga ra ni lag sor la //
T02TD1524E:80b-48: he ru ka dang rab dpa' mo //
T02TD1524E:80b-49: sindhu rkang pa'i bol du yang //
T02TD1524E:80b-50: padma gar dbang stobs chen ma //
T02TD1524E:80b-51: ma ru mthe bor rnam snang dang //
T02TD1524E:80b-53: ku lu t'a ni pus mor yang //
T02TD1524E:80b-55: sku yi rigs las nges byung ba'i //
T02TD1524E:80b-56: 'di dag ni sa 'og la spyod pa'o //
T02TD1524E:80b-57: dpa' bo de dag thams cad ni zhal gcig pa /
T02TD1524E:81a-2: 'khor lo so so'i kha dog dang mthun pa /
T02TD1524E:81a-3: g-yas dang po ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo ste /
T02TD1524E:81a-4: g-yon dang pos dril bu 'dzin zhing yum gyi sku la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1524E:81a-5: 'og ma gnyis kyis da ma ru dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa phyag rgyas rab tu brgyan pa ral pa'i cod pan no //
T02TD1524E:81a-6: dpa' mo rnams ni zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis kyis yab la 'khyud pas rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams te kun gyi dpral bar rdo rje'i phreng bas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1524E:81a-7: lce yi lkog tu khva gdong ma //
T02TD1524E:81a-8: sna yi rtser ni 'ug gdong ma //
T02TD1524E:81a-9: mtshan ma'i rtser yang khyi gdong ma //
T02TD1524E:81a-10: bshad ba'i lam du phag gdong ma'o //
T02TD1524E:81a-11: gshin rje sreg ma rna ba g-yas //
T02TD1524E:81a-12: g-yon par gshin rje pho nya ma'o //
T02TD1524E:81a-13: mche ba can ma mig g-yas te //
T02TD1524E:81a-15: lha mo de dag thams cad kyang //
T02TD1524E:81a-16: zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum ma //
T02TD1524E:81a-17: gcer bu phyogs na gnas pa rnams mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dang mtshungs te /
T02TD1524E:81a-18: mtshams rnams su mi phyed dbang phyug gi gzugs can yid 'phrog ma cha gnyis 'dzin pa /
T02TD1524E:81a-19: phyag rgya lnga dang dum bu'i ske rags kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1524E:81a-20: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yang //
T02TD1524E:81a-21: zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni //
T02TD1524E:81a-24: dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod de //
T02TD1524E:81a-25: sa bcu rnam par dag pa yi //
T02TD1524E:81a-26: sum cu rtsa bdun tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1524E:81a-27: byang chub phyogs la gnas pa yang //
T02TD1524E:81a-28: rnam par mi rtog sems bdag nyid //
T02TD1524E:81a-29: bde stong ro gcig gyur pa'o //
T02TD1524E:81a-30: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams //
T02TD1524E:81a-31: lha yi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1524E:81a-32: de nas go cha gnyis bshad de //
T02TD1524E:81a-33: gnas kyi rim pa sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1524E:81a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang dang //
T02TD1524E:81a-35: nyi ma padma gar dbang phyug / rta mchog he ru ka bdag nyid //
T02TD1524E:81a-36: sngags kyi rnam pa lha yi gzugs //
T02TD1524E:81a-37: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje ma //
T02TD1524E:81a-38: rmongs byed ma dang skrag byed ma //
T02TD1524E:81a-39: bskyod byed ma dang gtum mo ste //
T02TD1524E:81a-40: mkhas pas legs par dgod par bya //
T02TD1524E:81a-41: rang sngags las byung 'od zer spros //
T02TD1524E:81b-0: sngags dang phyag rgya'i @81b sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1524E:81b-1: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs //
T02TD1524E:81b-2: phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings las 'gugs //
T02TD1524E:81b-3: aom yo ga shuddha sarba dharma: yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02TD1524E:81b-4: de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo de mthong nas /
T02TD1524E:81b-5: ao sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa /
T02TD1524E:81b-6: tu m'am zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1524E:81b-7: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyi char 'bebs shing /
T02TD1524E:81b-8: aom sarba ta tha' ga ta aa bhi shinytsa sa ma ya shr'i ye h'um /
T02TD1524E:81b-9: de dag rjes su chags pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i byang sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur zhing bde ba chen po'i ngo bor gyur pa'o //
T02TD1524E:81b-10: rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1524E:81b-11: ro gcig gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1524E:81b-12: thugs gsung sku yi ye shes che //
T02TD1524E:81b-13: srog dang rtsol ba yang dag spro //
T02TD1524E:81b-15: rim pa bzhin gsal bar byas nas /
T02TD1524E:81b-16: spro dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid du gnas par bya ste /
T02TD1524E:81b-17: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-18: d'a ki n'i dzva la sa mba ram sv'a h'a /
T02TD1524E:81b-19: aom hri ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-20: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye /
T02TD1524E:81b-21: badzra warnna n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-22: aom badzra bee ro tse n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1524E:81b-23: aom shr'i buddha he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-24: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1524E:81b-25: aom sr'i karma he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-26: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra sv'ah'a /
T02TD1524E:81b-27: aom shr'i padma he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-28: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1524E:81b-29: aom shr'i ratna he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-30: d'a ki h'i dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1524E:81b-31: aom d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-32: aom y'a me h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-33: aom khanda ro ha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-34: aom r'u pi n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-35: aom na mo bha ga wa te w'i re sh'a ma h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-36: aom ma h'a kalp'agni sanni bh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-37: aom dza t'a ma ku totka t'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-38: aom damshtra ka r'a lo gra bhi sha na mu kh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-39: aom sa h'a sra pra bh'u dz'a bh'a su r'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-40: aom pa ra shu p'a sho dyam ta sh'u la kha tvam ga dha ri ni h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-41: aom ma h'a dhu mth'a nt'a k'a ra wa pu sh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1524E:81b-42: ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mo las 'phros pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
T02TD1524E:81b-43: slar tshur 'dus pas ro gcig zag pa med pa'i ye shes su thim pa'o //
T02TD1524E:81b-44: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis //
T02TD1524E:82a-0: @82a * // lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag /'gro ba rigs drug la bsgral nas //
T02TD1524E:82a-1: bla na med pa'i gnas su gzhag / sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las //
T02TD1524E:82a-2: yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1524E:82a-3: mtho ris mi lus sa 'og tu //
T02TD1524E:82a-4: lus can de ni sku gcig 'gyur //
T02TD1524E:82a-5: mnyam nyid gnas pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1524E:82a-6: rnal 'byor dbang phyug ldang ba na //
T02TD1524E:82a-7: mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba'i mchog / klus bskul ba ni dran par bya //
T02TD1524E:82a-8: thog mar bla ma mchod pa dang //
T02TD1524E:82a-9: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD1524E:82a-10: dbang bskur rol ba'i bde chen po //
T02TD1524E:82a-11: skad cig gis ni kun khyab pa'o //
T02TD1524E:82a-12: sku gsung thugs la gnas par bya //
T02TD1524E:82a-13: mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1524E:82a-14: snying rje chen po'i yid kyis ni //
T02TD1524E:82a-15: khams gsum pa yi sems can kun //
T02TD1524E:82a-16: shr'i he ru kar blta bya zhing //
T02TD1524E:82a-17: byang sems chu rgyun khrus bya ste //
T02TD1524E:82a-18: bcu phyed bdud rtsi'i zas las bza' //
T02TD1524E:82a-19: gcer bu skra grol lhor bltas la //
T02TD1524E:82a-20: brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1524E:82a-21: gsang ba'i rim par bstan pa'o //
T02TD1524E:82a-22: spros pa kun la dmigs nas ni //
T02TD1524E:82a-23: spros pas spros pa med par bya //
T02TD1524E:82a-24: spros pa nyid ni spros med byed //
T02TD1524E:82a-25: spros bral bde ba chen po ste //
T02TD1524E:82a-26: brtan dang g-yo ba'i 'jig rten kun //
T02TD1524E:82a-27: ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing //
T02TD1524E:82a-28: de nyid myur ba nyid du yang //
T02TD1524E:82a-29: bde mchog dam pa 'grub pa yin //
T02TD1524E:82a-30: bcom ldan sku gsung thugs la bzhugs //
T02TD1524E:82a-31: a'a li k'a li mnyam gnas pa //
T02TD1524E:82a-32: 'khor lo la ni nges par bskor //
T02TD1524E:82a-33: steng du 'bar ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1524E:82a-35: zag med dri med bde ba'i dngos //
T02TD1524E:82a-36: 'chi med thig le'i ngo bo ni //
T02TD1524E:82a-38: rtag tu snying gi dbus gnas pa //
T02TD1524E:82a-39: 'od gsal bde ba chen po ni //
T02TD1524E:82a-40: nyi ma zla ba rnam dag pa //
T02TD1524E:82a-41: 'char dang nub par bstan pa yin //
T02TD1524E:82a-42: sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing //
T02TD1524E:82a-43: bsod nams thams cad rnam par 'phel //
T02TD1524E:82a-44: de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te //
T02TD1524E:82a-45: gzhan du rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1524E:82a-46: lus med dri ma med pa ste //
T02TD1524E:82a-47: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rang bzhin //
T02TD1524E:82a-48: ye shes sku ni dri ma med //
T02TD1524E:82a-49: skye ba de nyid la thob 'gyur //
T02TD1524E:82b-0: @82b thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug cing //
T02TD1524E:82b-1: gnyis thim bcu drug cha phyed can //
T02TD1524E:82b-2: zag bcas bde med gnyis spangs pa //
T02TD1524E:82b-3: gsang ba dga' ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1524E:82b-4: dam tshig gsang ba chen po yi //
T02TD1524E:82b-5: sku gsung thugs la mnyam med la //
T02TD1524E:82b-6: rang gi mtshan nyid ngo bo stong //
T02TD1524E:82b-7: rtog pa gnyis ni rnam bral ba'o //
T02TD1524E:82b-8: 'das pa dang ni da ltar yang //
T02TD1524E:82b-9: ma 'ongs pa yi dus gsum po //
T02TD1524E:82b-10: lhan skyes ye shes mchog bde ba //
T02TD1524E:82b-11: dri med mkha' ltar dag pa'i bdag / gsang ba sems kyi spyod yul las //
T02TD1524E:82b-12: zung du 'jug ba'i ngo bor ni //
T02TD1524E:82b-13: mi rtog pa la rab gnas na ;
T02TD1524E:82b-14: / mchog gi sku ni nges par 'thob //
T02TD1524E:82b-15: bsgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te //
T02TD1524E:82b-16: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med //
T02TD1524E:82b-18: rdo rje 'chang gi sa thob pa'o //
T02TD1524E:82b-20: dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs pa //
T02TD1524E:82b-21: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs rnams kyis //
T02TD1524E:82b-22: me tog sna tshogs lag na thogs //
T02TD1524E:82b-23: rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1524E:82b-24: glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD1524E:82b-26: mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed //
T02TD1524E:82b-27: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gsang ba rin po che yid bzhin nor bu /
T02TD1524E:82b-28: dpal au rgyan gandho la'i gtsug lag khang nas /
T02TD1524E:82b-29: dri med ye shes mkha' 'gro mas rje btsun ti lo ba la gdams pa /
T02TD1524E:82b-30: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'i snying po dpal n'a ro pas mdzad pa'o /
T02TD1524E:82b-32: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta shr'i n'a ro pa chen po dang /
T02TD1524E:82b-33: bod kyi lo ts'a ba mar ba chos kyi blo gros bdag gis zhus te bsgyur ba'o//
